docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Monday refused to block new Arizona rules limiting the use of the most common abortion drugs, handing a victory to conservatives in a lawsuit over restrictions that are the most stringent in the nation.

headline.main: Judge Won't Block New Arizona Abortion Drug Rules
headline.print_headline: Judge Won't Block New Arizona Abortion Drug Rules

docs.snippet: A federal judge on Monday refused to block new Arizona rules limiting the use of the most common abortion drugs, handing a victory to conservatives in a lawsuit over restrictions that are the most stringent in the nation.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the weeks since Gov. Jan Brewer announced that she would not run for re-election, the already crowded field of Republicans looking to replace her has grown noisy.

headline.main: Nine in G.O.P. Vie to Succeed Arizona Governor, With Party Identity at Stake
headline.print_headline: Nine in G.O.P. Vie to Succeed Arizona Governor, With Party Identity at Stake

docs.abstract: Already crowded field of Republicans looking to replace Arizona Gov Jan Brewer has grown noisy, with nine candidates of widely varying interests and experiences vying for attention.
docs.snippet: In the weeks since Gov. Jan Brewer announced that she would not run for re-election, the already crowded field of Republicans looking to replace her has grown noisy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Hard data can help parents keep a cool head.

headline.main: How to Think About the Risk of Autism
headline.print_headline: How to Think About the Risk of Autism

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by molecular biology and neuroscience Prof Sam Wang underscores challenge of putting explosion of studies linking autism to a wide variety of genetic and environmental factors in perspective; describes his approach of giving prospective parents hard data so that they can make informed decisions.
docs.snippet: Hard data can help parents keep a cool head.
